reviews.comment:
Iâ€™ve been one of Janet Kerrs patients for a very long time, and Iâ€™ve been really happy and grateful sheâ€™s taken care of me. However, this week I had a dental emergency and Janet wasnâ€™t available. I was booked in with Imrana Ishaque- the first time Iâ€™ve had treatment with a different dentist for about 25 years, I think!
Imrana was simply lovely. She took time to explain my options, and she did a fantastic job re-constructing my broken tooth. Sheâ€™s also really intuitive. I didnâ€™t say or do anything, but at one point she stopped and asked me if my tooth was sensitive. She was really gentle, kind, and polite to the dental nurse. Pear Tree clearly has another absolutely excellent dentist. Thanks so much, Imrana!

reviewReply.comment: Janet Kerr and Imrana Ishaque, were both delighted to read your feedback detailing the dental care they have provided for you , Janet Kerr over the years and your emergency appointment with Imrana Ishaque and thank you for your kind words.

reviews.comment:
Attended today 09/09/25 for my annual checkup. I was greeted by a very efficient & pleasant receptionist. My Dentist Mr Javaad Mirza also greeted me very warmly which instantly put me at ease. My examination was very thorough & I was more than satisfied with my visit.
May I also take this opportunity to say that Mr Mirsa carried out some very complex dentistry on my husband recently. We were both delighted with the result & perseverance by Mr Mirsa to produce the best result for my husband.
The whole team were extremely helpful throughout the whole process.
Thank you to you all, we are so lucky & grateful to have such a brilliant Practice.

Jaqueline,  Javaad and the dental team were delighted to read your feedback not only from your recent appointment at the dental centre, but your husbandâ€™s experience too.
We strive as a team to provide a high level of dental care for all our patients and are pleased to hear that you found Javaad and the team to be warm, welcoming, proficient, helpful throughout the dental treatment provided and were happy with the end results.
We look forward to welcoming you both back to the dental centre at your next visit.

reviews.comment:
I have been a patient at this Dental Surgery for several years.
My appointments are always on time with no waiting.
Everyone is friendly, helpful and professional and I have confidence and peace of mind in both the treatment and advice I receive.
I recently transitioned to private care at the practice which was very easy due to the clear explanation provided of the available options.
I would recommend Pear Tree Dental Centre without hesitation.
